long_description: The versatile REI Spruce Run jacket has a zip-off hood and sleeves, along with a warm PrimaLoft fill that's tailored to where it's needed the most. PrimaLoft Eco fill is lightweight, nonbulky and water resistant, yet very warm; core has 100g of fill for extra warmth; sides and hood have 60g of fill for easy movement. Pertex Eco ripstop nylon fabric is windproof up to 60 mph, has a durable water-repellent finish (DWR) and a silky texture; shoulder fabric is reinforced. Jacket stows inside its own inner lumbar pocket for packing ease. Includes 2 zip hand pockets and 1 zip chest pocket with a cord port. The REI Spruce Run jacket has an adjustable hood and hem drawcord; front zipper has a chinguard and a stormflap; brushed collar lining adds a soft touch. Cuff gaskets seal in warmth.
short_description: The versatile REI Spruce Run jacket has a zip-off hood and sleeves, along with a warm PrimaLoft fill that's tailored to where it's needed the most.
